title: Mystical Lockets
description: A gripping middle-grade, magical realism book that will leave you mesmerized. Filled with cliffhangers and magical experiences, it might change the way you look at things.You manifested it. You got it. But can you handle it?Find yourself first. It will guide you itself. Is it that simple?What happens when it finds you? But… what if it is being found by something else?And a little surprise!This book is a story of innocent children, powerful lockets, and their fates tied together. Will they get to meet sometime soon?You get to decide that!This middle-grade, magical realism might seem to be an anthology but it might not be one. It is something huge… something finding its way… to you!Making her debut, Rashi Aggarwal brings you a story she has been working on for years. Get ready to experience a story that doesn’t end with this book. It starts here!
author: Rashi Aggarwal
